data.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Specs & Speed
data.meta_description: Samsung Galaxy S6: 5.1-inch (2560x1440), 16 MP Camera, 2550 mAh, Exynos 7420 Processor (3 GB)
data.text:
5.1" (2560x1440) Super AMOLED

3GB

Exynos 7420 SoC 32GB/64GB/128GB Storage

16-MP, f/1.9, OIS 1 Rear Camera

2550 mAh W-Charge

The Samsung Galaxy S6 phone has a 5.1-inch (2560x1440) Super AMOLED screen, a 16MP main camera and a 5MP selfie camera. The battery capacity is 2550 mAh and the main processor is a Exynos 7420 with 3 GB of RAM.

Galaxy S6 Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

+

How much is the Galaxy S6?

The last time we checked, the Galaxy S6 was retailing at around $220 online. Things may have changed a bit since.

+

Is the Samsung Galaxy S6 waterproof?

No. Our data indicates that the Galaxy S6 is NOT water-tight an has no IP-Rating rating.

+

Is the Galaxy S6 Dual-SIM?

No, the Galaxy S6 does not have dual-SIMs as far as we know, but it could be different in Abroad. We mainly track USA data.

+

Is the Galaxy S6 4K?

No, the Galaxy S6 2560x1440 resolution is not 4K.

+

Is the Galaxy S6 capable of Wireless Charging?

Yes, the Galaxy S6 supports Wireless Charging.

+

Does Galaxy S6 support Qi Wireless Charging?

Yes, the Galaxy S6 supports Qi Wireless Charging.

+

Is the Galaxy S6 compatible with 4G?

Yes, the Galaxy S6 is a 4G device that is rated 4G LTE cat6 (301 Mbps).

+

Does the Galaxy S6 work with 5G wireless?

No, the Galaxy S6 does not work on 5G NR networks.

+

Does the Galaxy S6 have a USB-C connector?

No, the Galaxy S6 is not a USB-C device.

+

Does the Galaxy S6 have a removable battery?

No, the Galaxy S6's battery cannot be removed.
